title: Bruce Springsteen + Johnny Cash ( Classic Roots )
description:
*******************************************


Get Ready For Something Awesome ! ! ! !


Featuring:


Bruce Springsteen!

Johnny Cash!

Bob Dylan!

And 
Many 
Others . . . 


Includes:

- Music CDs

- DVD Movies 

- Magazine Articles 

- Photos 

- Interviews 


Here Are The DVDs:


DVD - Hank Williams ( Honky Tonk Blues )

DVD - Johnny Cash All-Star Special 

DVD - Stompin' Tom ( Life of A Legend ) 

DVD - Bruce Springsteen ( The Seeger Sessions ) 


*****************************************************

The influence of blues, folk and country music has been 
felt for decades. Whether you're a fan of heavy-metal, 
punk-rock or pop-music - the chords, the storytelling, 
the heart-ache and laughter. . . . are all in some way
rooted right back to the days of traditional
Country-Western, Folk-Music and The Blues!
 
Even the Ã¢â‚¬Å“King of Rock N' RollÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Elvis Presley loved country!
The early days of rock were very much influenced by singers and 
songwriters like: Hank Williams, George Jones and Johnny Cash.

Long before rebels like Ã¢â‚¬Å“The Rolling StonesÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ were being arrested,
country singers were drinking whiskey, having sex with young women
and going to jail for breaking the law!

Songwriters have been getting pissed off and protesting against
the government since before the days of Woody Guthrie and Pete Seeger.
In the 1960's Bob Dylan wrote folk-songs that criticized society,
questioned traditional values and expressed anger towards
the unjust laws and greedy politicians.

Ã¢â‚¬Å“Protest-FolkÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ has inspired many great artists, both young and old - 
from Bob Dylan and John Lennon to Nirvana and Jack Johnson.
There are just so many singers and songwriters who owe a debt of
gratitude to the legends of Country-Western, Folk-Music and The Blues!
